message.body: When are you guys heading to the theater?
I have no fucking idea because no one told me this was an actual plan that was happening. When are you going?
We kind of showed up super early. There are only 50 people that bought tickets though lol, so you can come anytime really
You're already there?? Omg so early. And we won't even have buffalo wild wings to eat
I would puke right now lol. I'm saving room for popcorn this time. But ya, there's 50 people total
Whaaat, Sweatz is already with you? Cool to get the invite. I guess we'll be there in a little bit
I'm sorryyyyy I thought he would of told you. That's why I texted you lol
Ya'lls straight jerks
Also he just told annie not to come lolololol
Hey thanks for coming tonight you guys! I don't know where you went when we walked out, but I'm glad ya guys made it
We went home! Why are you being weirdly nice?
Because everyone's leaving and it's depressing, and I'm always nice wtf
I'm not leaving until july so you still have plenty of time to ignore me, don't worry :D
Ohhh bullshit lol. We had a lovely conversation about batman and animalman last night
Yeah, that was nice. I miss hanging out with everyoneeeee
Me toooo, and I'm heading back to vail next week which is shitty.
We all gave up on seeing you ever again already, but that sucks anyway! You're leaving work?
Lol Jesus that's harsh. No I'm staying at work until I move in July
Well jesus, quit being so sad, we'll all still see each other sometimes
I have squirt and peanut m&m's so fuck it
Omg that sounds perfect. I just ate a salad and I hate my life
Ugggg why would ya? Grossss. My night is perfect, squirt, candy, diablo and Star Trek. Jay-z ain't got shit on me
I'm watching american horror story and it's very upsetting! I'm sure jay z is doing something much cooler than you, like wearing shoes made out of animals
Seriously so sad you told me you have squirt and m&ms. The perfect meal
I feel perfect after eating it all too...kind of. There aren't any star treks that I want to see right now though. Channel surfingggg
Not enough wil wheaton for you? Omg the cat brought us a half alive baby bird and it keeps crying in pain WHAT DO I DO
I can't kill a baby bird, I'm vegan
Lol that's the worst thing I've ever heard. Put it outside and apologize to the earth
Cat took it, I'll do a ritual in the moonlight later. Omg I guess sushi garden is happening tomorrow?? Fuck yes
It's a new moon, the bird died in vain now. I guess it is, I think Sally's family owns that place or something. She brings them more business than their
commercial
I fucking love sushi garden. Gonna get all kinds of seaweed up in me.
That's a Japanese porno. A good one too. I just want crab puffsssss. Watching Star Trek wrath of khan now
Grooosss. I accidentally laughed out loud when zachary quinto yelled "khaaan" in the movie last night, whoops
Who the FUCK are you to laugh at Spock!?...I giggled a little
You're right, we both have gorgeous bangs, I love him. He's the bad guy in american horror story and I've been watching that all week, so it was weird for me
Cumberbach crushed a dude's head with his hands, so that was weird for me
Omg sooo badass. Dat voice.
Lol SHALL WE BEGIN? What a cool SOB
I didn't really see the appeal until that movie, now I just want him to get all sweaty and say things to me
I'm better than you-at what?- everything...#sweetnothings from cumberbach
Don't be a dick, come to sushi
I have no moneyyyy :(
A thing of crab puffs is like...3 bucks
Fineeee, it's at 7?
YAY YES
Kkkkkkkk
Annie is getting unlimited crab puffs so you can sneakily eat some of hers
#toomuchpride
